p: Following the treatment of CPT and/or Rb3 in GP-293 cells, the medium was discarded, and the cells were washed using PBS, and fresh culture medium (1 mL) was added. Following, 1 mL of JC-1 working solution was added into the cells to incubate at 37°C for additional 20 minutes. After incubation, the cells were washed twice with the precold JC-1 staining buffer and digested with 0.25% trypsin. The digested cells were used for flow cytometry analysis.
